reviewText: This is not a jazz dance routine, but a cardio workout infused with dance moves including box steps, mambos, and charlestons.  I would rate this as an intermediate workout, not too complex or choregraphed, but nice when you want a break from walking!
i hate the video.  it was more like an aerobic workout video than a jazz dance video. if you are looking for a jazz dance video, don't buy this dvd.  it was a waste of money.
